titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of the Right Honourable Spencer, Earle of Northampton, who died a conquerour at the battaile of Hopton-heath.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title, leaf A2r.
Annotation on Thomason copy, leaf A1: "Oxon May 24 1643"; leaf A2: "Oxford May the 24th 1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
